name: Mike The Jumper
description:
Play a game where you play as a person named Mike who likes jumping!

Made in 4 days with barely any effort for the Black and White jam 8 with the theme of loop.

Controls

Move with A and D, J and L, or the left and right ARROW keys

Jump with W, I, or the up ARROW key

Credits

Everything was made by me :) (Clive Dev)

Special thanks to the playtesters:

  • Pixel Wolves
  • da77as
  • The4thAD
Tools Used
